name: Advanced_Modules
title: Advanced Modules
author: MaxelDel
description:
Adds advanced and combied Versions of Modules and 9 new Beacons.
Reduces the Price of all Modules, makes Efficency Modules cheaper than other Modules.
Adds Pollution Reduction to Efficency Modules.
Added Modules:
Pure Speed and Pure Productivity 
ranging from MK1-MK6.
Added Beacons:
Efficency Beacon, Speed Beacon and Productivity Beacon 
ranging from MK1-MK3.
After the Game has finished you can create God Modules
